verses.verse: Now <S%G3796>after<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> as it began to <S%G2020>dawn<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2334>see<s%> the <S%G5028>tomb.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G4578>an<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> and <S%G4334>came<s%> and rolled <S%G617>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2374>door,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1883>on<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2397>appearance<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G796>lightning,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1742>clothing<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G5510>snow.<s%>
<S%G575>For<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> the <S%G5083>guards<s%> <S%G4579>shook,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> dead <S%G3498>men.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> the <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who has been <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

He <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he has <S%G1453>risen,<s%> just <S%G2531>like<s%> he <S%G2036>said.<s%> <S%G1205>Come,<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G2749>lying.<s%>

<S%G4198>Go<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1453><s%> 'He has risen <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> he goes <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> you will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>' <S%G3700>Behold,<s%> I have <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> and <S%G5143>ran<s%> to <S%G518>bring<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G518>word.<s%>

<S%G5613>As<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2532>disciples,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5463>"Rejoice!<s%>" They <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> took <S%G2902>hold<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G5399>be<s%> <S%G5399>afraid.<s%> <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G2546>there<s%> they will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4198>while<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4198>going,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2892>guards<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the things that had <S%G1096>happened.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4824>counsel,<s%> they <S%G1325>gave<s%> a <S%G2425>large<s%> amount of <S%G694>silver<s%> to the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Say that <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> away <S%G2837>while<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G2837>slept.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G191>comes<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%>'s <S%G191>ears,<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> will <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> make <S%G5209>you<s%> free of <S%G275>worry.<s%>"

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they were <S%G3778>told.<s%> This <S%G3056>saying<s%> was <S%G1310>spread<s%> abroad <S%G3844>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and continues <S%G3360>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3101>the<s%> <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5021>sent<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>
<S%G2532>When<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they bowed <S%G4352>down<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G1365>doubted.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to them and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> has been <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

<S%G4198>Go,<s%> <S%G3767>and<s%> make <S%G3100>disciples<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>

<S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5083>observe<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3745>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2250>always,<s%> even <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>age.<s%>" <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
